headline: Fluke Reliability and Treon Partner to Elevate Industrial Asset Performance with AI Diagnostics and IoT Sensors
summary: Everett, Washington, June 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Fluke Reliability and Treon today announced a strategic partnership to help customers shift from reactive to predictive maintenance outcomes that elevate industrial asset performance. Combining Treon’s wireless sensor technology with Fluke Reliability’s expertise in AI diagnostics and predictive maintenance software enables customers to translate data into actionable insights. This partnership helps customers detect equipment failures before
